sentences.sContent: I parked my baby at the neighbor's house.
sentences.sContent_eng: I parked my baby at the neighbor's house.
sentences.sCn: 我把小孩寄放在邻居家里。

sentences.sContent: It means you love Him with all your heart, and you love your neighbor as yourself.
sentences.sContent_eng: It means you love Him with all your heart, and you love your neighbor as yourself.
sentences.sCn: 它意味着你全心全意的爱上帝并且像爱自己那样爱邻居。

sentences.sContent: See, if you break any one of those commandments, you do not love your neighbor as yourself.
sentences.sContent_eng: See, if you break any one of those commandments, you do not love your neighbor as yourself.
sentences.sCn: 看，如果你违反了其中任何一条戒律，你就没能像爱自己那样爱邻居。

words.tran: 睦邻的；友好的；邻居似的
像邻居的；亲切的；睦邻的
邻近；周围；邻居关系；附近一带
与…为邻；位于附近（neighbor的ing形式）
